author: Rainer Winkler
description: This is not an innovative idea, but fast and cheap to implement, so I post it here. Even if a new cooling technique is invented, it will work better if all other possible actions are performed.
summary: Between the PPE, the skin and layers of clothing air is trapped. By inserting a fan inside the PPE, the air inside the PPE is forced to move. This improves the heat conductance between skin and PPE.
title: Active ventilation in the PPE to improve heat transfer
